cab.content:
Col Jones. (This Document is the Property of His Britannic Majesty's Government.)
Circulated by the Secretary of State for India.
SECRET.
G.T. 4330 From Viceroy, Foreign Department, 22nd April 1918
(Received 23rd, 2.30 p.m.)
Secret. Weekly report. North-West Frontier quiet. Baluchistan. For Mari situation see separate reports.
General military situation unchanged.
